resources.string: Savitribai Phule Pune University is one of the premier universities in India. The university houses 46 academic departments. It is popularly known as the \'Oxford of the East\'. It has about 307 recognized research institutes and 612 affiliated colleges offering graduate and under-graduate courses.

After the declaration of result, the next step towards the B.Tech admission process is counselling process. The qualified candidates have to undergo through the counselling process followed by the requisite payment of the counselling fee. As soon as the payment will be done, candidate will be eligible for filling the choices for colleges. Result of the allotted seats will be sent to the candidates via SMS individually. The candidates are required to download the seat allotment letter from the official site of the board and report to the allotted college within the prescribed date. Once the admission fee will be paid, the admission of the candidate is confirmed.
• Total score should be at least 50% (BC: 45%, Disability: 45%)
• At least 50% marks in diploma examination (BC: 45%, Disability: 45%)
• At least 50% marks in BSc examination (BC: 45%, Disability: 45%)
• Marks scored in MHT-CET examination will be considered for Maharashtra students
• Children of NRI / OCI / PIO should have passed HSC or equivalent exam
• If the student has not given MHT-CET examination, marks scored in JEE Main Paper 1 can be considered for admission
• 5% reservation is present for children of defense personnel
• 3% reservation is present for candidates with disability :
• Reservations are applicable only for candidates belonging to Maharashtra state
• 50% of the total seats are allocated under reservation
Note: Please carry 3 sets of photocopies

Explore the best institutes across Pune in one place!

Find everything that you will need around your college including bookstores, restaurants and daily food services, hostels and accommodation and places to hang out with your friends.


Just select an institute from the list below and get started!
Hostel Fee DD to be drawn in name of :

Sinhgad College of Engineering is a technical education institute in the city of Vadgaon (Budruk), Pune, India. It was established in the year 1996 with 4 UG Programs and a sanctioned intake of 240 students. The institute is affiliated with the Savitribai Phule Pune University and managed by the Sinhgad Technical Education Society (STES). The college takes its name from the nearby Maratha fort. It has been accredited by the National Board of Accreditation and recognized by the AICTE. The institute has also been awarded an \'A\' Grade by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council.
For Boys - \"Sinhgad Boys Hostel\" , Payable at Pune
For Girls - \"Sinhgad Girls Hostel\" , Payable at Pune

RMD Sinhgad Technical Institutes Campus Warje, Pune was established in 2011-2012 under the umbrella of Sinhgad Institutes. The campus is well connected by Air, Rail and Bus. It is a lush green campus with good hostels for boys and girls, messes, canteens, sports ground, cultural centre etc.
3. Pragati Book Depo, Appa Balwant Chowk
Smt. Kashibai Navale College of Engineering

Smt. Kashibai Navale College of Engineering (SKNCOE) is a technical institution in the locality of Vadgaon Budruk in the city Pune, India. It is affiliated with the Savitribai Phule Pune University, and managed by the Sinhgad Technical Education Society. It has been accredited by the National Board of Accreditation and recognized by the AICTE. The institute has also been awarded an \'A\' Grade by The Directorate of Technical Education (DTE), Maharashtra state, Mumbai.
For Boys - \"Sinhgad Boys Hostel\" , Payable at Pune
For Girls - \"Sinhgad Girls Hostel\" , Payable at Pune

Smt. Kashibai Navale College of Engineering (SKNCOE) is a technical institution in the locality of Vadgaon Budruk in the city Pune, India. It is affiliated with the Savitribai Phule Pune University, and managed by the Sinhgad Technical Education Society. It has been accredited by the National Board of Accreditation and recognized by the AICTE. The institute has also been awarded an \'A\' Grade by The Directorate of Technical Education (DTE), Maharashtra state, Mumbai.
For Boys - \"Sinhgad Boys Hostel\" , Payable at Pune
For Girls - \"Sinhgad Girls Hostel\" , Payable at Pune

From the academic year 2005-06, Sinhgad Academy of Engineering was started. It conducts four-year degree courses in the fields of Mechanical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Information Technology and Electronics and Telecommunication. The college also has well equipped Hostels and Mess, Canteen, and Clinic for first level medical assistance with a Campus Doctor. Transportation exists round the clock for medical emergencies.
For Boys - \"Sinhgad Boys Hostel\" , Payable at Pune
For Girls - \"Sinhgad Girls Hostel\" , Payable at Pune
Sinhgad Institute of Technology (SIT) is an educational institute in Lonavala, India. It was established in 2004 and is a part of Sinhgad Technical Education Society, Lonavala campus.
For Boys - \"Sinhgad Boys Hostel, Lonavala\" , Payable at Pune
For Girls - \"Sinhgad Girls Hostel, Lonavala\" , Payable at Pune
Sinhgad Institute of Technology and Science

SKN Sinhgad Institute of Technology and Science situated at a beautiful location of Lonavala campus of Sinhgad, established in 2011 is a part of a well-known educational trust Sinhgad Technical Education Society having registered office in Pune. SKN Sinhgad Institute of Technology and Science is affiliated to the Savitribai Phule Pune University and is approved by AICTE.
For Boys - \"Sinhgad Boys Hostel, Lonavala\" , Payable at Pune
For Girls - \"Sinhgad Girls Hostel, Lonavala\" , Payable at Pune
SKN Sinhgad Institute of Technology and Science

The college has modern, state-of-the-art infrastructure appropriate to conduct to engineering education. The college has qualified and experienced faculty engaged in teaching and research. The college laboratories have modern equipments and experimental setups. The campus is Wi-Fi with 100 Mbps dedicated internet lease line out of which 32 Mbps is available to students after college hours and around 1200 computers with latest configuration are fully networked.
For Boys - \"Sinhgad Boys Hostel, Lonavala\" , Payable at Pune
For Girls - \"Sinhgad Girls Hostel, Lonavala\" , Payable at Pune
